name: TypeHandler_createValueTest
description: Unit tests for the TypeHandler.createValue method, specifically for handling URL creation.

test_cases.name: testCreateValueSuccess
test_cases.description: Tests the successful creation of a URL using TypeHandler.createValue.

test_cases.name: testCreateValueThrowsParseException
test_cases.description: Tests that TypeHandler.createValue throws a ParseException when given an invalid URL.
